name: iridescence
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of showing many bright colours that change with movement: A lot of people when they catch a fish are amazed at the iridescence. The walls are greyish-blue to green, with a pearly iridescence. See
iridescent
More examplesFewer examplesHe was struck by the iridescence of the stained glass windows. The frost on the houses was suddenly caught in a ray of sun giving them a shimmering iridescence. She found that mingling colours in shadows created a stunning iridescence.
